price: Isin irraa namni jechaan (sagalee) gadi qabeefi ol fuudhes waluma qixa. namni halkan dhokateefi guyyaa ifatti ba’es (waluma qixa).
arabic: سَوَآءٞ مِّنكُم مَّنۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ وَمَن جَهَرَ بِهِۦ وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡفِۭ بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَارِبُۢ بِٱلنَّهَارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: sawāon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasāribun bil-nahāri
